remarks: The value of the left group action of element ` A ` of group ` G ` at ` B ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 18-Mar-2008.)
statement:
grplact.1 $e |- F = ( g e. X |-> ( a e. X |-> ( g .+ a ) ) ) $.
grplact.2 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
grplactval $p |- ( ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( F ` A ) ` B ) = ( A .+ B ) ) $.
$d .+ a g $.
$d A a g $.
$d B a $.
$d G a g $.
$d X a g $.
